name: Atticus Advisory Solutions Inc.
description: Atticus Solutions was founded to recognize and provide opportunities for Filipino talent, and our dedication has paid off - we have grown from just one staffer deployed in 2016, to now having a community of 400! We take pride in our proactive communication style and intent on adding value, as well as providing top-notch customer service. We specialize in supporting technology consulting firms, startups, and small to medium enterprises that use or sell cloud technology platforms such as Netsuite, AWS, ServiceNow and more. In order to attract the right offshore talent, We even formed specialized communities within its various technology verticals. Through Atticus’ services, you’re sure to discover the perfect team with the skillset you need.

Boost Hiring Manager Confidence and Productivity
Reduce the Cost of Hiring Qualified Employees

enhanced_description: Atticus Advisory Solutions Inc. is a specialized HR advisory and recruitment firm dedicated to identifying and providing opportunities for offshore Filipino talent. Founded in 2012, Atticus has demonstrated significant growth, expanding its deployed staff community from one in 2016 to over 400. The company focuses on supporting technology consulting firms, startups, and small to medium enterprises that leverage or sell cloud technology platforms, including prominent ones like Netsuite, AWS, and ServiceNow. Atticus prides itself on its proactive communication, commitment to adding value, and delivering top-notch customer service. To ensure the acquisition of highly skilled professionals, they have developed specialized communities within various technology verticals, enabling clients to efficiently discover the perfect team with the precise skillsets needed.
